scripts.publish: npm run bump && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git push origin main && npm run release
scripts.publish:minor: npm run bump:minor && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: bump minor version" && git push origin main && npm run release
scripts.publish:major: npm run bump:major && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: bump major version" && git push origin main && npm run release
scripts.build:offline: npm run update-version && cross-env OFFLINE_BUILD=true docusaurus build
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:offline && npm run electron:build
scripts.build:electron:win-x64: npm run build:offline && cd electron && npm run build:win-x64
scripts.release: node -e "const v=require('./electron/package.json').version; require('child_process').execSync('git tag v'+v+' && git push origin v'+v, {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.serve:offline: cross-env OFFLINE_BUILD=true docusaurus build && docusaurus serve --port 3000 --host 0.0.0.0
